reports.summary: Analyzed 3 API mismatches in Helpers.lean. Root cause: type mismatch between validity (⊨ φ) and semantic consequence ([] ⊨ φ). Fix: use valid_iff_empty_consequence conversion theorem. Effort: < 30 minutes.

plans.summary: 5-phase implementation plan (1 hour total). Fix line 126 type mismatch, fix line 131 validity unwrapping, compile verification, run 146 integration tests, validation and documentation.

summaries.summary: Fixed 3 API mismatches in Helpers.lean. All 146 integration tests now compile and pass. Implementation completed successfully.
